description: International standard for information security management systems

controls.title: Policies for information security
controls.description: Information security policy and topic-specific policies shall be defined, approved by management, published, communicated to and acknowledged by relevant personnel and relevant interested parties, and reviewed at planned intervals and if significant changes occur.

recommendations: Define IAM policies following least privilege principle
Use AWS Organizations for policy management
Enable AWS Config rules for compliance
Implement IAM policies at appropriate levels
Define custom roles with least privilege
Use Open Policy Agent for policy enforcement

controls.title: Internal organization
controls.description: Roles and responsibilities for information security shall be defined and allocated.

recommendations: Define IAM roles matching organizational structure
Use AWS SSO for centralized access
Define Azure AD groups for teams

controls.title: Mobile devices and teleworking
controls.description: Rules for the use of mobile devices and teleworking shall be established and appropriate security measures shall be implemented.

recommendations: Use AWS WorkSpaces for virtual desktops
Use AWS Systems Manager for device management
Use Microsoft Intune for device management
Implement conditional access based on device

controls.title: Prior to employment
controls.description: Background verification checks on all candidates for employment shall be carried out in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and ethics.

recommendations: Use Azure AD B2B for contractors

controls.title: During employment
controls.description: Management shall require all employees and contractors to apply information security in accordance with the established policies and procedures of the organization.

recommendations: Use Access Analyzer for permission analysis

controls.title: Termination and change of employment
controls.description: Information security responsibilities and duties that remain valid after termination or change of employment shall be defined, communicated to the employee or contractor and enforced.

controls.title: Responsibility for assets
controls.description: Assets associated with information and information processing facilities shall be identified and an inventory of these assets shall be drawn up and maintained.

recommendations: Use AWS Config for asset inventory
Use Azure Resource Graph for inventory
Enable Azure Arc for hybrid assets

controls.title: Information classification
controls.description: Information shall be classified in terms of legal requirements, value, criticality and sensitivity to unauthorized disclosure or modification.

recommendations: Use Amazon Macie for data classification

controls.title: Media handling
controls.description: Procedures for the handling of removable media shall be implemented in accordance with the classification scheme adopted by the organization.

controls.title: Business requirements of access control
controls.description: An access control policy shall be established, documented and reviewed based on business and information security requirements.

controls.title: User access management
controls.description: A formal user registration and de-registration process shall be implemented to enable assignment of access rights.

controls.title: User responsibilities
controls.description: Users shall be required to follow the organization's practices in the use of secret authentication information.

controls.title: System and application access control
controls.description: Access to information and application system functions shall be restricted in accordance with the access control policy.

controls.title: Cryptographic controls
controls.description: A policy on the use of cryptographic controls for protection of information shall be developed and implemented.

recommendations: Use AWS KMS for key management

controls.title: Key management
controls.description: A policy on the use, protection and lifetime of cryptographic keys shall be developed and implemented through their whole lifecycle.

controls.title: Secure areas
controls.description: Physical security perimeters shall be defined and used to protect areas that contain either sensitive or critical information and information processing facilities.

controls.title: Equipment
controls.description: Equipment shall be protected from physical and environmental threats.

controls.title: Operational procedures and responsibilities
controls.description: Operating procedures shall be documented and made available to all users who need them.

controls.title: Protection from malware
controls.description: Detection, prevention and recovery controls to protect against malware shall be implemented, combined with appropriate user awareness.

controls.title: Backup
controls.description: Backup copies of information, software and system images shall be taken and tested regularly in accordance with an agreed backup policy.

controls.title: Logging and monitoring
controls.description: Event logs recording user activities, exceptions, faults and information security events shall be produced, kept and regularly reviewed.

controls.title: Control of operational software
controls.description: Procedures shall be implemented to control the installation of software on operational systems.

controls.title: Technical vulnerability management
controls.description: Information about technical vulnerabilities of information systems being used shall be obtained in a timely fashion, the organization's exposure to such vulnerabilities evaluated and appropriate measures taken to address the associated risk.

controls.title: Information systems audit considerations
controls.description: Audit requirements and activities involving verification of operational systems shall be carefully planned and agreed to minimize disruptions to business processes.

controls.title: Network security management
controls.description: Networks shall be managed and controlled to protect information in systems and applications.

controls.title: Information transfer
controls.description: Formal transfer policies, procedures and controls shall be in place to protect the transfer of information through the use of all types of communication facilities.

domains.name: A.14 System Acquisition, Development and Maintenance

controls.title: Security requirements of information systems
controls.description: Information security related requirements shall be included in the requirements for new information systems or enhancements to existing information systems.

controls.title: Development and support processes
controls.description: Rules for the development of software and systems shall be established and applied.

controls.title: Test data
controls.description: Test data shall be selected carefully, protected and controlled.

controls.title: Information security in supplier relationships
controls.description: Information security requirements for mitigating the risks associated with supplier's access to the organization's assets shall be agreed with the supplier and documented.

controls.title: Supplier service delivery management
controls.description: Organizations shall regularly monitor, review and audit supplier service delivery.

controls.title: Management of information security incidents and improvements
controls.description: A consistent and effective approach to the management of information security incidents shall be ensured, including communication on security events and weaknesses.

domains.name: A.17 Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity Management

controls.title: Information security continuity
controls.description: Information security continuity shall be embedded in the organization's business continuity management systems.

controls.title: Redundancies
controls.description: Information processing facilities shall be implemented with redundancy sufficient to meet availability requirements.

controls.title: Compliance with legal and contractual requirements
controls.description: All relevant legislative statutory, regulatory, contractual requirements and the organization's approach to meet these requirements shall be explicitly identified, documented and kept up to date.

controls.title: Information security reviews
controls.description: The organization's approach to managing information security and its implementation shall be reviewed independently at planned intervals or when significant changes occur.
